2K2.1.title: Unlawful Receipt, Possession, or Transportation of Firearms or Ammunition

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the offense involve a semiautomatic firearm capable of accepting a large capacity magazine (>15 rounds) OR a firearm described in 26 U.S.C. § 5845(a) (short-barreled rifle/shotgun, machinegun, silencer, destructive device)?
Did the defendant commit the offense subsequent to sustaining at least TWO felony convictions of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?
Did the defendant commit the offense subsequent to sustaining ONE felony conviction of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?
Was the defendant a prohibited person under 18 U.S.C. § 922(g), OR convicted under § 922(d)/932/933, OR convicted under § 922(a)(6)/924(a)(1)(A) with intent to transfer to a prohibited person?

yesResult.description: Semiauto/NFA firearm + prohibited person or straw purchase

baseOffenseQuestions.text: Did the defendant commit the offense subsequent to sustaining at least TWO felony convictions of either a crime of violence or a controlled substance offense?

Did the offense involve a firearm described in 26 U.S.C. § 5845(a) (short-barreled rifle/shotgun, machinegun, silencer, destructive device)?

specificOffenseCharacteristics.text: How many firearms were involved in the offense?
Did the defendant possess all ammunition and firearms solely for lawful sporting purposes or collection, without unlawful discharge or use?
